content:
cfallin commented on issue #3847:

Also, I'll note that the nature of this PR (changes over almost all lines in ISLE rules) means it will be a merge conflict with pretty much any other change to the ISLE rules. I rebased my in-progress work to current main; happy to do so again if someone else has in-flight work, but otherwise hopefully this doesn't stay outstanding for too long :-)
